title: Deva Curl Travel Kit
description: Devacurl Travel Kit The perfect way to bring DevaCurl with you wherever you go! Contains travel size (3oz.) bottles of our most popular products: Devacurl One Condition 3 oz; Devacurl No-Poo 3 oz; Devacurl Angell 3 oz; Devacurls Set It Free 3 oz. Not Tested on animals! Made in the USA

title: Devacurl Microfiber Towel
description: The Deva Towel provides a smooth surface and absorbs just enough water allowing our styling products to set curls while keeping them defined, frizz-free and intact. Microfiber Friction free Frizz free

title: Deva Concepts Devacurl Microfiber Drying Deva Hair Drying Gloves
description: Features ten soft microfiber fingers to provide a smooth surface that surround curls to absorb just enough water to allow DevaCurl styling products to set curls, keeping them frizz free and intact.
